created_by: oscd.community, Teymur Kheirkhabarov @HeirhabarovT, Zach Stanford @svch0st, wagga
name: Mounted Windows Admin Shares with net.exe
description: Detects when an admin share is mounted using net.exe
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe) AND process.command_line:*\ use\ * AND process.command_line:*\\\*\\*$*)`
